## PerformanceClient.startPerformanceMeasurement() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> This method will be removed in the next major version
> 

Starts and returns an platform-specific implementation of IPerformanceMeasurement. Note: this function can be changed to abstract at the next major version bump.

**Signature:**

```typescript
startPerformanceMeasurement(measureName: string, // eslint-disable-line @typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars
    correlationId: string): IPerformanceMeasurement;
```
